docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 24 -- The American republics today began preparations for breaking off diplomatic relations with the Axis as the conference of American Foreign Ministers completed plans for a plenary session Monday when signatures will...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 24 -- The American republics today began preparations for breaking off diplomatic relations with the Axis as the conference of American Foreign Ministers completed plans for a plenary session Monday when signatures will be affixed to the agreements for an organized front.

headline.main: Peru and Uruguay Lead Republics Of Americas in Breaking With Axis; PERU AND URUGUAY BREAK WITH AXIS

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO -- Try to imagine the West Coast of the United States separated from the East Coast by hundreds of miles of impenetrable jungle flanked on one side by a mighty barrier of mountains whose peaks reached skyward more than 22,000 feet....
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO -- Try to imagine the West Coast of the United States separated from the East Coast by hundreds of miles of impenetrable jungle flanked on one side by a mighty barrier of mountains whose peaks reached skyward more than 22,000 feet. Imagine, too, the Californians not being able to understand the language spoken by New Yorkers, due to their different nationalities.

docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 25 -- Uruguay has promptly carried out the decisions of the Rio de Janeiro conference and shares with Peru the distinction of being the first to act in accordance with the resolution recommending a rupture of relations with the Axis.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Jan. 26 -- The political committee of the conference of American Foreign Ministers, in its preparations today for the final ratifying session of the conference tomorrow, adopted a resolution declaring that the American republics could...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Jan. 26 -- The political committee of the conference of American Foreign Ministers, in its preparations today for the final ratifying session of the conference tomorrow, adopted a resolution declaring that the American republics could continue relations with the governments of countries invaded by the Axis powers, thereby indicating support for the smaller members of the warring United Nations group.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 26 -- Bolivia and Paraguay severed diplomatic and economic relations with the Axis powers today as the conference of American foreign ministers here completed preparations for the ratifying of its decisions and adjourning...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Jan. 26 -- Bolivia and Paraguay severed diplomatic and economic relations with the Axis powers today as the conference of American foreign ministers here completed preparations for the ratifying of its decisions and adjourning at a plenary session tomorrow.
